bibl.title: Summons

keywords.term: Missouri, County of Saint Charles, Saint Charles
Missouri, County of Saint Charles, Portage Des Sioux

div1.p:
Territory of Missouri
County of Saint Charles
Yet The United States of America To The Sheriff of the County of Saint Charles Greetings

We command you to Summon Henry Haight, if he be found in your county to be and appear before the Honorable The Judge of our Circuit Court to be holden for the County of Saint Charles at the Court House in the Town of Saint Charles, On the fourteenth day in October next. Then and there to answer Ann a free black woman, of a plea of trespass withfore and arm, to the damage of the said Ann of Five hundred dollars. And have then there also this week.

Witness William Christy Junior clerk of our said court at Saint Charles the fourteenth day of August, in the year of our lord one thousand and eight hundred sixteen, And in the forty first year of the independence of the United States
WM Christy Jr.

Ann a free black woman
vs.
H Haight

Executed the 8th day of Octo 1816
Devine Sherrif Service $.80_ Mileage $.70
To the Clerk of the Circuit Court for St Charles County in Northern Circuit
Let a summons issue in this case

Filed the 25th July 1816
William Christy Jr. Clerk

Received the within declaration with summons enclosed on the 28 th august 1816 and executed the same at the Residence of the defendant in the township of Portage Des Sioux on the eighth day of October 1816
